reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will Read Again
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Good character development. The plot is not complex (which is good because it’s a novella), and all plot points are resolved by the end.⭐️The spice is indeed spicy. This is one kinky couple🥵. Like, it’s a darn good thing they don’t have neighbors. There are a couple of scenes where either I misunderstood the positioning as described or the FMC had some completely dislocated limbs that she wasn’t complaining about, but I’ve found that to be very common in written porn. ⭐️Consent!!! So many dark “romance” authors try to pass off torture and SA as CNC, but I am happy to report that clear consent was given between the MCs before they got down and dirty. ⭐️⭐️I am a bloodthirsty soul, so I enjoyed the violence as well as both MCs’ acceptance of their own enjoyment of it. I hate when the woman is written as forgiving everyone instantly without even a little torture. ⭐️Cons:Some errors in grammar and punctuation, but nothing egregious and only a couple of them made me pause to figure out what was meant.In the dialogue, some of the turns of phrase seemed rather British, which always throws me off when the characters are American. I had to get used to the word “as” being used in place of “because” in all of the explanatory statements.*Slight spoiler: I noticed one mistake in continuity where the FMC was shocked to learn that the MMC knew about her sketchbook even though he had previously told her he had spied on her while she sketched in it.This was my first time reading one of Selena Winters’ works, and I will now go look for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Really Enjoyed It
reviews.reviewText: This book had so many bad reviews and I can honestly say I’m not sure why. I actually really liked it. Maddox is sexy af and crazy, which I love. I do think the instalove stuff is a bit much and the way they meet is honestly bizarre. But like, what do you expect from a weird book? Lololol. Overall, I would say it’s pretty unique. It’s a little much and can be overwhelming for some reasons. Definitely check the trigger warnings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Consensual Dark Spice
reviews.reviewText: I love a good dark romance, but lack of consent is off putting. This book takes care of that, with fast paced romance and consensual spice, it’s perfect. If you’re looking for a quick read, primal kink, mask kink, etc., this is for you. It’s a simple story line, the plot developed just enough to be enjoyable but not drag on and on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rating a 3 is generous
reviews.reviewText: The same issues as this author’s first book-it literally makes no sense. I honestly wanted to stop after the first chapter and I probably should have.54% I had to stop, literally could not take the nonsense anymore. I will get back to it, but for now… really? The high ratings and the #1 short horror has me befuddled.The very first chapter was so so stupid. Like logistically so dumb and made zero sense. The MFC left their shared apartment for a yoga class sometime between 7-10am based on flight time frame.. came home what, an hour later because the boyfriend didn’t come pick her up, to find him in a threesome giving and taking it up the butt with two women. Uhm 🤨? No matter how stupid the man is, there is no way he could think “Gee, she just left, it’s 7am and I know I’m leaving on vacay in an hour, let’s call some b****es over and do this on our white couch, lose track of the already extremely limited window and be shocked gf shows up”I was so excited to read this after it showed up on my FB feed. Storyline is right up my alley, but wow. What a disappointment. The book continues much like the first chapter and just has you scratching your head. First Maddox used to be a dom in a smex club, then he’s a notorious bank robber/murdered so many people he’s lost count, who has been hiding out in Alaska for seven years, yet he can’t be older than 35.. so both of those things happened in his early to mid twenties???? Wow. Busy boy. Even the much awaited spicy scenes were such a letdown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't wait to read more by this author
reviews.reviewText: This is the first book I've read by this author, it's not going to be the last. I loved this. It's a deliciously dark Christmas story. Ivy is a girl who has been confined all her life by high society and her mother. Maddox is a bit violent and obsessive when it comes to all things Ivy. But, in a good way of course. If you like dark romance this is up your alley. Read on my friend I promise you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I want to be stranded with him
reviews.reviewText: A short but so hot story, that I totally devoured. Great cover model by the way! This dark story had me so invested in these characters. I really enjoyed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So damn good
reviews.reviewText: Ommggg this was wild and crazy. So far this is my favorite dark romance novella. This was so good and spicy. Very damn spicy. Strangers to lovers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very spicy and obsessive
reviews.reviewText: What a violently hot hot hot book. Maddox is obsessed with his angel and no one will take her from him. His favorite games are of taking her while she screams no. Spoiler*** the scene when he drugged her was so so so spicy. 🌶️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I need and want a Maddox ! A tall muscle bound man to whisk me away to his retreat in Alaska !Fab quick read loved the spice ! A lot of spice too !! 🔥🔥
Oh my! Selena has NAILED this! 🥵I absolutely loved Maddox and his madness. He's a caveman! This story had my Kindle melting and me in a puddle! 🤌🤤

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hot, dark and dangerous from beginning to end. High tension and chemistry between the mcs. Love how unhinged the mmc is
